panels.visual: Visual: Lightsword holds up the ENCHANT card, magical energy swirling toward Darkstorm. The wolf's eyes widen. Characters: Lightsword, Darkstorm

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.

panels.visual: Visual: DARKSTORM TAKES FLIGHT! Massive silver wolf soaring through the air, magical energy trailing from its paws, lunging at the tower goblins with fangs bared! Characters: Darkstorm (flying), Tower Goblins

panels.visual: Visual: The Goblin Boss calls retreat, remaining goblins fleeing into the underbrush. Garrett emerges from behind his wagon, relieved. Characters: Goblin Boss (fleeing), Garrett
panels.dialogue: Goblin Boss: "RETREAT! RETREAT!" Garrett: "By the gods... you saved me!"
